stem:
Renu poured 1250 ml of water into a jar. Only two measurement numbers on the jar can be seen.

Which of the following shows Renu's jar with 1250 ml of water?
testing_objective: A: Read the scale incorretlyB: Read the scale incorrectly.C: CAD: Read the scale incorrectly

option_data.option_image: throughout annual clean insignificant march matter instead nor
